movie.title: Under My Nails
movie.description_intro: In the search to fulfill her most obscure desires, Solimar will find love in the hands of a murderer.
movie.description_full: In the search to fulfill her most obscure desires, Solimar will find love in the hands of a murderer.

movies.title: Bordello of Blood
movies.summary: The old bag of bones 'Cryptkeeper' returns for his second full length feature flick about a funeral home that's a front for a whorehouse run by vampires.
movies.description_full: The old bag of bones 'Cryptkeeper' returns for his second full length feature flick about a funeral home that's a front for a whorehouse run by vampires.
movies.synopsis: The old bag of bones 'Cryptkeeper' returns for his second full length feature flick about a funeral home that's a front for a whorehouse run by vampires.

movies.title: Behind the Screen
movies.summary: Three movies are being shot simultaneously and Charlie is an overworked scene shifter. The foreman is waited on hand and foot until all the shifters but Charlie go on strike. A girl looking for work pretends to be a man and helps Charlie. Charlie discovers her gender and falls in love with her. The foreman thinks they are homosexual and in the ensuing fight they become involved in a long pie throwing scene from one of the movies in production. The frustrated workers dynamite the studio.

movies.title: Hidden Camera
movies.summary: When a Pulitzer Prize-winning reporter is killed in a mass murder in a Barcelona hotel room, maverick reporter Dan Kovaks, the dead journalist's brother, launches an investigation all his own. But now he and his hard-driving producer, Alejandra Velor, are being hunted by the killers and a vast network of government agents on both sides of a military conflict brewing in North Korea. But who's working for whom and who can be trusted? Those are the questions troubling Dan and Alejandra as they fight to stay alive and unravel the mystery of a super-secret item dubbed the "Mega-Bill."

movies.title: Enter the Warriors Gate
movies.summary: A teenager is magically transported to China and learns to convert his video game skills into those of a Kung Fu warrior.
movies.description_full: A teenager is magically transported to China and learns to convert his video game skills into those of a Kung Fu warrior.
